intro: Our programs make it easy for you to support renewable energy generated anywhere in the United States.
title: Do you have a preference on where the renewable energy you support is generated?

answers.title: I prefer to support renewable energy generated in the eastern United States.
I prefer to support renewable energy generated in or near Virginia.

intro: Our programs can include solar, wind, hydro, and biomass, as well as other renewable resources like geothermal, wave, tidal, and more!
title: Do you have a preference on the type of renewable resources included in your program?

answers.title: Renewable resource type doesn’t matter to me.
Renewable resources should be mostly solar, wind, hydro, and biomass.

intro: Some of our renewable programs allow you to cancel at any time, while others require a minimum of a one-year commitment.
title: How long are you willing to commit to a renewable program?

answers.title: I’m comfortable committing to a renewable program for at least a year.
I would like to be able to cancel at any time without penalty.

intro: Our programs can match 100% of your monthly electricity consumption - or just a portion. Some programs have a "block" option which guarantees your monthly fees are fixed and you pay the same amount each month. Either way you're reducing your environmental impact!
title: How much of your monthly electricity consumption would you like to match with renewable resources?

answers.title: All of it! Match 100% of my electricity use for the most environmental impact.
Match a portion of my electricity use for a fixed monthly fee.
